programme.title: Equality in New York, Clinton in Russia
programme.short_synopsis: President Clinton's trip to dissuade Boris Yeltsin from sending nuclear aid to Iran.
programme.medium_synopsis: The development of equality in New York City, and President Clinton's mission to dissuade President Yeltsin from sending nuclear aid to Iran, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.
